summary.para: Important Deprecated. This API may be removed from future releases of Windows. Applications should use the Media Session for playback.
Contains flags that describe a media item.

remarks.para: The following typedef is defined for combining flags from this enumeration.

summary.para: The media item represents a live data source, such as video camera. If playback is stopped and then restarted, there will be a gap in the content.
The media item supports seeking. If this flag is absent, the method will fail.
The media item can pause. If this flag is absent, the method will likely fail.
Seeking can take a long time. For example, the source might download content through HTTP.
